import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import "./styling/RegistrationCSS.css" import Axios from "axios"; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const RegistrationPage = ({ }) => { const [customerID, setCustomerID] = useState([]); // let id = 0; // for (let i = 0; i < customerID.length; i++) { // let temp = customerID[i]; // if (temp > id) { // id = temp; // } // } useEffect(() => { Axios.get('http://localhost:3001/getid').then((response) => { setCustomerID(response.data); console.log(response.data); }); }, []); return (
